com.siperian.bdd.userexits.operations

Interface IHMRelationshipSaveOperationPlugin

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IBaseOperationPlugin

    public interface IHMRelationshipSaveOperationPlugin
extends IBaseOperationPlugin

    Defines the user exits for the HM relationship related operations:

    • edit
    • create
    • delete (end-date relationship)

    Each of the following operations are handled uniformly by UserExits and have the following four phases:

    • beforeEverything(java.util.List)
    • afterValidation(java.util.List)
    • beforeSave(java.util.List)
    • afterSave(java.util.List)

    Note, in all classes implementing this interface there is only one OperationType that is expected: OperationType.HM_RELATIONSHIP_OPERATION. Method afterSave(java.util.List) is allowed for modification of HM Data. It is expected that afterSave can return instance of HMOperationResult class with information about modifications made by User Exit. Modification of data can be done by means of SIF API. All changed objects (HM relationships and Entities) must be listed in the instance of BDDHMGraph that is returned in HMOperationResult in case of successful completion of operation. Instances of BDDHMRelationship and BDDHMEntity inside returned BDDHMGraph need to implement only few methods:

    • BDDHMEntity.getEntityTypeUID
    • BDDHMEntity.getRowidValue
    • BDDHMRelationship.getRowidValue()
    • BDDHMRelationship.getRelTypeUID()
    All other methods of those interfaces are not used during handling of returned HMOperationResult.

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String RELATIONSHIP_ID
      Name of the parameter in the OperationContext.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

      OperationResult afterEverything(List<BDDHMRelationship> savingObjects)
      Operation is being executed by BDD when one of the following HM relationship related operations are ended: edit create delete (end-date relationship) The code implementing this method operates with read-only data BDDHMRelationship and can perform data verification.
      OperationResult afterSave(List<BDDHMRelationship> savingObjects)
      Operation is being executed by BDD when one of the following HM relationship related operations are ended: edit create delete (end-date relationship) The code implementing this method operates with read-only data BDDHMRelationship and can perform data verification.
      OperationResult afterValidation(List<BDDHMRelationship> savingObjects)
      Operation is being executed by BDD when the validation is done prior to the following HM relationship related operations: edit create The code implementing this method operates with read-only data BDDHMRelationship and can perform data verification.
      OperationResult beforeEverything(List<BDDHMRelationship> savingObjects)
      Operation is being executed by BDD when the validation is about to be started prior to the following HM relationship related operations: edit create delete (end-date relationship)
      OperationResult beforeSave(List<BDDHMRelationship> savingObjects)
      Operation is being executed by BDD when one of the following HM relationship related operations are about to start but when validation is already processed: edit create delete (end-date relationship) The code implementing this method operates with modifiable data BDDHMRelationship and can perform data verification.

    • Field Detail

      • RELATIONSHIP_ID

        static final String RELATIONSHIP_ID
        Name of the parameter in the OperationContext. OperationContext.getValue(RELATIONSHIP_ID) must return HM Relationship ROWID_OBJECT or null in case relationship has been created but not saved yet.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • beforeEverything

        OperationResult beforeEverything(List<BDDHMRelationship> savingObjects)

        Operation is being executed by BDD when the validation is about to be started prior to the following HM relationship related operations:

        • edit
        • create
        • delete (end-date relationship)

        The code implementing this method operates with read-only data BDDHMRelationship and can perform data verification. The result of verification should be communicated through OperationResult. This type of operation supports the following return codes:

        • OperationExecutionErrorType.ERROR
        • OperationExecutionErrorType.CONFIRMATION
        • OperationExecutionErrorType.WARNING

        Notes:

        • delete (end-date relationship) operation doesn't support OperationExecutionErrorType.CONFIRMATION.
        • Multiple instance of OperationExecutionErrorType.ERROR or OperationExecutionErrorType.WARNING can be returned through OperatoinResult. They will be displayed all together in a single message dialog.
        • OperationExecutionErrorType.CONFIRMATION must be the only returned message. Otherwise it will be ignored.

        Transaction type:NON TRANSACTIONAL

        Parameters:
        savingObjects - list of HM relationships BDD is currently operating with
        Returns:
        OperationResult instance
        See Also:
        OperationResult

      • afterValidation

        OperationResult afterValidation(List<BDDHMRelationship> savingObjects)
        Operation is being executed by BDD when the validation is done prior to the following HM relationship related operations:
        • edit
        • create
        The code implementing this method operates with read-only data BDDHMRelationship and can perform data verification. The result of verification should be communicated through OperationResult. This type of operation supports the following return codes:
        • OperationExecutionErrorType.ERROR
        • OperationExecutionErrorType.CONFIRMATION
        • OperationExecutionErrorType.WARNING
        Notes:
        • Multiple instance of OperationExecutionErrorType.ERROR or OperationExecutionErrorType.WARNING can be returned through OperatoinResult. They will be displayed all together in a single message dialog.
        • OperationExecutionErrorType.CONFIRMATION must be the only returned message. Otherwise it will be ignored.

        Transaction type:NON TRANSACTIONAL

        Parameters:
        savingObjects - list of HM relationships BDD is currently operating with
        Returns:
        OperationResult instance.
        See Also:
        OperationResult

      • beforeSave

        OperationResult beforeSave(List<BDDHMRelationship> savingObjects)
        Operation is being executed by BDD when one of the following HM relationship related operations are about to start but when validation is already processed:
        • edit
        • create
        • delete (end-date relationship)
        The code implementing this method operates with modifiable data BDDHMRelationship and can perform data verification. The result of verification should be communicated through OperationResult. This type of operation supports the following return codes:
        • OperationExecutionErrorType.ERROR

        Note:Multiple instance of OperationExecutionErrorType.ERROR can be returned through OperatoinResult. They will be displayed all together in a single message dialog.

        Transaction type:TRANSACTIONAL

        Parameters:
        savingObjects - list of HM relationships BDD is currently operating with
        Returns:
        OperationResult instance.
        See Also:
        OperationResult

      • afterSave

        OperationResult afterSave(List<BDDHMRelationship> savingObjects)
        Operation is being executed by BDD when one of the following HM relationship related operations are ended:
        • edit
        • create
        • delete (end-date relationship)
        The code implementing this method operates with read-only data BDDHMRelationship and can perform data verification. The result of verification should be communicated through OperationResult. This type of operation supports the following return codes:
        • OperationExecutionErrorType.ERROR

        Note:Multiple instance of OperationExecutionErrorType.ERROR can be returned through OperatoinResult. They will be displayed all together in a single message dialog.

        Transaction type:TRANSACTIONAL

        Parameters:
        savingObjects - list of HM relationships BDD is currently operating with
        Returns:
        OperationResult instance. If returned instance is of HMOperationResult then IDD will analyze returned BDDHMGraph instance and perform update of internal HM Graph to reflect changed made by User Exit.
        See Also:
        OperationResult

      • afterEverything

        OperationResult afterEverything(List<BDDHMRelationship> savingObjects)
        Operation is being executed by BDD when one of the following HM relationship related operations are ended:
        • edit
        • create
        • delete (end-date relationship)
        The code implementing this method operates with read-only data BDDHMRelationship and can perform data verification. The result of verification should be communicated through OperationResult. This type of operation supports the following return codes:
        • OperationExecutionErrorType.WARNING

        Note:Multiple instance of OperationExecutionErrorType.WARNING can be returned through OperatoinResult. They will be displayed all together in a single message dialog.

        Transaction type:NON TRANSACTIONAL

        Parameters:
        savingObjects - list of HM relationships BDD is currently operating with
        Returns:
        OperationResult instance.
        See Also:
        OperationResult
